name: test_prometheus_integration[spring_boot_app-8080-/actuator/prometheus]
description:
arrange: after 12-Factor charm has been deployed.
    act: establish relations established with prometheus charm.
    assert: prometheus metrics endpoint for prometheus is active and prometheus has active scrape
        targets.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: after 12-Factor charm has been deployed.
act: establish relations established with prometheus charm.
assert: prometheus metrics endpoint for prometheus is active and prometheus has active scrape
    targets.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Application not scraped in port 8080.
